about_the_game:
Space! The final Frontier...

Join us in Opollo, a simple yet deep little minimalist space shooter, harking back to the old days of popping dimes into an arcade and the first man walking on the moon.

With over 200+ plane combinations to unlock, take to the skies in unique combinations to complete challenges and reach new high scores. Space exploration has never been this frantic, with a host of pesky enemies to combo-chain together, and the Primal Colossus to defeat... 

Stylish Combat - with simple controls that provide depth through a power mechanism, shoot, dash and regain life in a finely tuned balance to drift and weave through enemy fire.

Celestial Tunes - Voyager is returning with a whole host of new relaxing tunes to elevate the cosmic aesthetic.

Customisable Space Ship - Guns, Wings and engines can be unlocked and swapped out for over 200+ unique combinations. find the one that suits you to reach new high scores.

We hope you will join us in playing Opollo, and as the first man walked on the moon, so you too will go down in galactic history as well.

We hope you have fun!

With Kind regards,

Planetary Gears
